snippet: President Obama can quickly adopt a new call for an end to the ineffective and constitutionally dangerous dragnet surveillance.
abstract: Editorial praises report released by panel of intelligence and legal experts commissioned by Pres Obama, which calls on the government to end its bulk phone-data collection program and increase transparency and accountability of surveillance programs; urges Obama to quickly adopt the panel's recommendation and end dragnet surveillance.
lead_paragraph: President Obama can quickly adopt a new call for an end to the ineffective and constitutionally dangerous dragnet surveillance.
